note:
I'm a self-aware composite life form comprised of trillions of interdependent microorganisms, a contemporary link in a 4 billion year self-replicating carbon-based chemical process.

I'm neurodivergent, pan, and queer. My interests include: jazz, synthesizers, astrophysics, evolutionary biology, philosophy, machine learning, formal logic, computer science, hacking, GNU/Linux, socialism, scifi worldbuilding, and game design.
